description.value: You can transform yourself or the bodies of others to express your displeasure. Once per day, you can cast either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Aerial Form] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Baleful Polymorph] as a 7th-level primal innate spell. You must take the form of a bird when using this aerial form.
